resources.string:
Welcome to the Tournament Maker app ! Here is how you can start creating your very own tournament: 

1. Navigate to the tournament tab and hit the '+' button. 

2. Here you will prompted to choose a tournament name, type, participants, stats and size. Don't worry if you don't have any participants yet, we can create them with the select participants button and clicking on the '+' button afterwards. 

3. Now select the tournament you have created. The matches have been automatically generated for your tournament. 

4. Once a match is complete, you may enter the stats and results by clicking on the match and editing it. 

5. You may view the ranking as the tournament is active in the rankings tab. Teams have a ranking of 0 if they have not played a game yet. 

6. The tournament will end automatically once all matches have been edited and marked as completed.
